meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>winter</radical>, the <radical>woman</radical> has to go through all the <radical>rice</radical> and <kanji>count</kanji> each individual grain. Once she's counted all of them, she'll have an <kanji>amount</kanji> / <kanji>number</kanji> so that she can split them up accordingly.
readingMnemonic: Why are you so low on rice? It's because someone <reading>sue</reading>d (すう) your farm and took everything you owned. So, you had barely enough rice (or not enough).
